item.title: Uglei Fingurs
item.dc:creator: RestlessMind
item.description:
there needs to be a script implemented into the game that prevents people usinhg specific steam id’s from the playing the game at all.

hell, while you’re at is, put in a script that prevent their ip’s, too.

not saying this neccessarily in association with this specific thread, but there ARE some specific people on this forum who do nothing but bitch and moan, and this is where such a script should be implemented.

i know it won’t prevent kids from playing the game, but i bet they’ll be a lot more appreciative of a game after they’ve changed their ip and created a new steam account just to play it.

That sure sounds like a lot of work to the mature end of: “You can’t come in OUR treehouse, nee-nar-nee-nar!” :tired:

Read full topic

item.title: Uglei Fingurs
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
RestlessMind:

Hey Ram, if you read what’s on the other pages of the thread, I said there I didn’t think you guys needed to change anything.

But listen all of you, I’m going to drop this, because it’s really getting tiring. For me anyways, you all seem to have boundless energy for this bullshit.

Perhaps you did after you called the devs half assed and their (haha, VALVe’s) work stupid and annoying.

It’s not that we have boundless energy for your bullshit, it’s just that you are excreting so much of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Uglei Fingurs
item.dc:creator: RestlessMind
item.description:
While we’re on the topic of incessant dorks, you might like to reconsider the fact that those are Valve’s stock humanoid animations. We’re using Half-Life 2’s human rig which contains several hundred basic movements like walking and running, holding and firing a gun, sitting and standing; all of which work perfectly fine for all intents and purposes. The only problem is that they are set up to use three fingers, not five. We’ve adjusted the meshes as best we can, but we don’t have the manpower to redo every single one of those simply because you don’t like the way one NPC holds his gun (which you won’t even be able to see in-game). I don’t know how many times you want people to repeat this for you.

Hey Ram, if you read what’s on the other pages of the thread, I said there I didn’t think you guys needed to change anything.

But listen all of you, I’m going to drop this, because it’s really getting tiring. For me anyways, you all seem to have boundless energy for this bullshit.

Read full topic
